## CounterStyleRenderer.renderCounter() method

Render an index into its counter representation, equivalent to CSS `counter` function. See [CSS Counter Styles Level 3, Counter Styles](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-counter-styles-3/#generate-a-counter)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderCounter(index: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | The counter value to render. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
